```{r}
# Read In
baseball <- read.csv("https://ajohns24.github.io/data/home_runs.csv")

baseball <- baseball %>%
  mutate(is_home_run = ifelse(is_home_run == 1, "yes", "no"))

baseball <- baseball %>%
  mutate(is_home_run = as.factor(is_home_run))
```
